item.title: Resume
item.description: For the most up to date introduction and contact information, checkout the about page on this website. Experience Squarespace June 2016 - Present Senior Software Engineer Lead the migration efforts of the monolithic CMS platform to Kubernetes which involved coordination with 7+ teams and multiple quarters to deliver. Migrated 544 VM based instances across 11 different fleets spanning two data centers to Kubernetes with zero production incidents.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Mark. I’m a New York City based Software Engineer currently working at Squarespace. I work on the core, monolithic, CMS platform contributing backend software, building frameworks and platforms to build product features on top of, and operating the multitude of binaries running in production. I spend my free time working at theprepared.org’s workshop/makerspace/coworking community in Bed Stuy, Brooklyn building hardware projects and learning about manufacturing. item.title: Initial Commit
item.description: Over the last several years of my life, I have spent a lot of time doing things and not nearly enough time talking about them. This rendered my previous personal website with very little content and leaves the personal projects I’ve invested well too much time on unknown to the world. Beyond simply sharing my work, I’m interested in a more formalized and public retrospective where I take time to think about the lessons I’ve learned.
